title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The Cartman house. Liane is sipping her coffee on the sofa. She lowers it as Cartman screams

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Mom! MOOOM! Mom!  Seriously! Something wonderful has happened!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What is it, snookums?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Mom, look! The tooth fairy! I put a tooth under my pillow, and she gave me two dollars!  She's only given me a lousy quarter before!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh my! She must think that you are a very special little muffin.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah! This is so tits!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Don't say "tits," Eric.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, I mean, this is so cool!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, then, now you should take that money and open up a savings account that has compounded daily interest.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Heh, you can compound daily my ass with interest, Mom; I'm goin' to the toy store and buy me a skateboard!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: But Eric, I think maybe the tooth fairy wants you to use that money to learn about saving.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Mom, you don't know what the tooth fairy wants me to do with this money, okay? You're not the tooth fairy! I'll see you later!  Aw, man, this is so tits!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The bus stop. Stan, Kyle and Kenny stand around

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hey you guys! You're not gonna believe this!  Oh my God, you guys, seriously! Just wait until you hear this, you guys! I'm rich! I'm totally rich!  Aren't you stoked?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What the hell's wrong with Cartman?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: He's fat and he's stupid?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Look what the tooth fairy left me last night!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Two dollars!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No way!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: For one tooth?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: For one tooth.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude, every time I lost a tooth I only got a quarter.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I only got a jar of gifelte fish.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, that doesn't matter, because I have an idea that is totally tits.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: ...Totally what?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Look, I don't know why the tooth fairy's being so cool to me. Maybe she's hot for me. I don't know, but if we all chip in with teeth, then I can hide them under my pillow and we could get enough money to buy a  Sega Dreamcast.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Sega Dreamcast??

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: All we need is teeth.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I already lost all my baby teeth.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Me too.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (Nuh-uh.)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You still have baby teeth, Kenny?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (No way!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Kenny, think about it. Don't you want a  Sega Dreamcast?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (No I don't! Thank you.)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Alright! Kenny's in, you guys! Tits!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The school yard. Stan ties Kenny to a tetherball pole. The string leads off to the right

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Okay, the string is tied to Kenny's tooth. You ready over there?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Almost. You ready, Timmy?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Timmiihh!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: When I say "go," you slam your electric wheelchair into high gear. Okay, Timmy?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Timmiihh!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Right. You're Timmy.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Timmiihh! Lemmeouttaheah!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (Why the fuck does it have to be my tooth?)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I'll tell you why it has to be you, Kenny: because your family is poor, and therefore has bad oral hygiene, so your teeth are gonna fall out someday, anyway. If you think about it, you should actually be thanking us.  "Oh, thank you, guys." You're welcome, Kenny.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (Fuck you!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Alright! Get ready, Timmy.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Timmiihh!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Heh-hey guys, uh, wu-what are you doin'?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What does it look like we're doing, Butters? We need a tooth, so we're using Timmy's wheelchair to pull out one of Kenny's.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh. Heh, I got a loose tooth right here.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You what?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (You what?)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Timmih-

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yyep. Oo-one of mine came out not two hours ago.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Uh, Butters, could we have it?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Wwell, heck no! Uh you can't have it. Why, I'm gonna stick it under- my pillow and get money from the tooth fairy. She gives me fifty cents a tooth.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Ha-a-ugh.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, uh, see ya, fellas.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude, maybe we don't have to rip a tooth out of Kenny's mouth.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah, we just have to get Butters' tooth.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (Woohoo!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How are we gonna get it from him?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I guess we'll have to sneak into his house after he goes to sleep tonight.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah, let's go.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Go! Timmy go!  Yeah, Timmy!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No, Timmy, wait!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Engh go uh Timmy!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (Hey, guys!)  (Heey-ungh)  (Oowww.)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hahahahahaha. Hey, you guys, I can see Kenny's pengling, hahahahahaha.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hu-aah!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: A house, night. Butters is asleep in his room. A pole rises outside with a grinning Cartman dressed as a tooth fairy dangling from it

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Higher, you guys.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Jesus Christ, why did we pick the fat guy to lift up in there?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Agh! Careful, you assholes!  To the left, you guys, left.  No, camera left, camera left!  That's it, now down.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What the-?  Who's there? Who is that?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I am the tooth fairy, my child.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hoh. Sorry, Miss Fairy. I didn't mean to gaze at you. I'm back to sleep now, see?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Sure. Now I will leave you tidings under your pillow.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, oh gosh, I, I didn't think you'd be so fat.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Ey!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Come on, fatass!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Do not open your eyes until morning. Or else I will kick you in the nuts. Square in the nuts.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yuh, yu-yes ma'am!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Bull's eye!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Cartman's house, later. He's being tucked in bed

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Tucky tucky time, it's the best time of the night.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I love that song, Mom. Sing it again.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No, honey, Mommy's gotta save her throat. I have to work tonight.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Okay.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Good night.  What do you have there, Eric?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Another tooth fell out today; I'm leavin' it for the tooth fairy.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, my. The tooth fairy will have to give you a big surprise for losing two teeth in two days.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I know, huh?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The bus stop, next morning. Stan, Kyle, and Kenny are there

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You guys! Oh my God, you guys! You're not gonna believe it! It's beyond rational thought, you guys!  Holy crap, you guys! I mean-

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Did the tooth fairy come?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Four dollars.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh my God!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Four dollars?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (Oh, my God!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Do you what this means?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah. We just gotta keep finding teeth and putting them under your pillow.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dentist office, some days later. A phone rings

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dentist office.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh. Eh-hello, Dr. Roberts? It's Ms. Cartman.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, yes, Ms. Cartman. What can I do for you?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, it's my son. He's lost a lot of his baby teeth, and I was starting to get worried.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, losing baby teeth is a natural thing, Ms. Cartman. How many has he lost?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: About a hundred and twelve.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: ...A hundred and twelve.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yes. Fifteen of them in one night. Perhaps he should switch toothpaste?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Your son wouldn't happen to be an "alligator," would he? No? Hm, I see. Well, I'm afraid I can't help you right now. The American Dental Association convention is this week, but, as soon as I get back, I'll look into it.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: O-oh, thank you. Freebie next week.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Cartman's room, dawn. He rises and throws his pillows off the bed

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Tih-  Tooth?  What the hell? Mom!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yes, Eric

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You know, the tooth fairy forgot to bring me money last night! Call the police!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh. Eric, poopie, sit down.  Mommy has something to tell you. It's just that- well, there is no tooth fairy, Eric. I've been putting all that money under your pillow, and because you got so many teeth fall out, I've actually run out of money and can't go to the grocery store for at least a month.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You almost had me for a second there, Mom, heh. "There's no tooth fairy." I suppose you're gonna tell me there's no Santa Claus, Easter Bunny, or Jesus, either, heh, heh...  M- Mom?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I'm sorry, Eric. All children find out sooner or later.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yi- you're serious here. There really is no tooth fairy?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No, honey. It's just-

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How could-? How could you lie to me, Mother? Lie right to my face?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, Eric, it's just part of being a child.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How can I trust you?  How can I trust anyone ever again, Mother? I guess, uh to make it through this life, I can only trust myself.  Myself and Willikins Bear, of course.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Eric! Eric, wait!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No, Mother! No more lies!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The Cartman house. Stan, Kyle, and Kenny wait. Cartman exits and walks down the street upset, ignoring his friends

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude, where's the money?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: There is no money.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No more money??

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What are you talking about, Cartman?! We're only $167 away from gettin' a Sega!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I know!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Cartman, what's going on?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You guys...  Oh, God, I don't even know how to tell you this.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Tell us what?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You guys, there's... there's no tooth fairy, you guys. There, I said it.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What do you mean, "there's no tooth fairy?"

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: My mom has been giving me the money all this time, and your parents are the ones who left you money.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: That can't be. My parents wouldn't lie to me.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: But now my mom has given us so much money that she's bankrupt, and we're poor, like Kenny.  Don't touch me, Kenny.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You're wrong. If my dad says something is real, then it's real!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Kyle, open your eyes, man!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: It's not true!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The Broflovski house. Kyle enters the living room. Gerald is on the sofa reading the newspaper

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, hello, son.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dad, there is so a tooth fairy, huh?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What? Oh. Kyle, let's have a little talk.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh my God! You did lie to me.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No. Kyle, she's just make-believe. Like Peter Pan.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Peter Pan, too??

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Kyle...

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What about Moses and Abraham?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, they were probably real.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Probably?! Is Atlantis real??

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Probably not.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Wahahahah!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Look, Kyle, adults make up those things because they're fun for children.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Fun for children?! Fun for children?! Look at me, Dad! I don't even know what's real anymore! Weaaaah!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The town. The boys less Stan sit at a curb moping

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Man, I can't believe all our parents lied to us about the tooth fairy.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What about Dan Rather? Do you think he's real?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No, man, that's just a TV show.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You guys! You guys! I figured it out!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What? That your parents lied to you, too?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah, but, it's okay! We can still get our Sega Dreamcast!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Look, the tooth fairy is all made up, right?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: All made up. Not real. Nothing's real.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: So all we have to do is go to a really rich kid's house, put our tooth under his pillow, wait for his parents to leave him a whole buttload of money, and then sneak back in and take it!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (Woohoo!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The kid will never even know.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, dude, that is tits! I mean, that is big fat Oprah tits right there!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh my God, what if I'm not real?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: We can take the bus to the city. There's super-rich people down there!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I mean, what if I'm just part of my parents' reality?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Come on, Kyle!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What if this is all just somebody's dream?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Cherry Creek, the wealthiest neighborhood in Colorado, night. The bus pulls up to a curb and drops the boys off in front of a three-story mansion

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Wow, look at the size of these houses!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Totally, dude. Cherry Creek is the richest part of Denver. I'll bet these kids get at least ten bucks a tooth from the  "Tooth Fairy."

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hey,  that house looks perfect. There's obviously kids living there.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: There. You can tell this is the kid's window 'cause it's got Mega Man stickers on it. Cartman, once you're in the kid's room, leave the tooth under the pillow, then come back out. We'll wait for the parents to see it and leave money, then swing you back in the house to grab it.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Got it.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: This is the smartest business venture ever.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What the-?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hey, what the hell are you guys doing?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: We're gonna sneak a tooth under this rich kid's pillow, then come back and collect the tooth fairy money that his parents leave him.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: ...Hey, you can't do that!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Why not?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Because that's what we're doing!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah! You ripped off our idea!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What the hell are you talking about?! We've been doing this for over two years!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Two years?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Nice tooth fairy costume. You think anybody'd believe you in that?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: It's better than your dress! You look like a bad Jennifer Lopez nightmare!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How dare you!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Look, this is our turf! You'd better scram before the Boss breaks your legs!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You scram! We were here first!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What's going on?  Oh! It's the tooth fairies!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, nice going! Now you woke him up!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You woke him up!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I don't have any loose teeth, Miss Fairies but I have been a very good boy.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Shut up!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Alright, that does it! Come on, we're going to see the Boss!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Who's the Boss?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Loogie.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Loogie's Ristorante. The light above the door is the one that flickers

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: My associates here tell me you were working Cherry Creek tonight. Is that true?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Uuh, yeah.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Right on our turf, Boss! I ain't ever seen that kind of disre-  Erp.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: We were there first!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Kids have been doing the tooth fairy racket in this town for years.  I do it just like my big brother before me, and my oldest brother before that.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Damnit! And we thought we were so original!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Let me ask you something: You were gonna sneak a tooth under this rich kid's pillow? Then what?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, uh-what do you mean?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How are the kid's parents gonna know there was a tooth under their child's pillow?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Ha! You guys don't even know how the tooth trade works!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What's a "tooth trade?"

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Look, any shmuck can sneak through a window wearing a pretty dress. The tooth racket is much more involved.  We keep careful track of what houses we've hit so that we don't hit the same one twice in less than two months.  Inside the house we not only have to sneak a tooth under the pillow, but leave a note for Mom and Dad to see.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
role: This is how we let the parents know to leave money under the
text: pillow. [the fairies ride through the neighborhood on their bikes] Once the note is in place in the last house, we start all over, going back to the first house. But this time, all we have to do is collect money. [shots of the tooth fairies cleaning up] And the kids never know what hit 'em.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Wow!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The hardest part is getting teeth. We tried various places. Cemeteries , hockey games , anywhere we can find them

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Nooo!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The teeth we do manage to acquire are then sorted according to size, color, and quality.  But there's never enough teeth. Never enough.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Amazing.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Man, that is tits!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: And now my only problem is, what do I do with you?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Rowwr!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Tell you what: how would you like to run the South Park tooth racket for me?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh. Uh-I don't know.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: It's that, or else I can cut off your penises.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hm. Work for you, have my penis cut off. Work for you, have my penis cut off. Hm's see...

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Cartman!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How much do we get if we work for you?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I'll cut you in at 2%.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Two percent, have my penis cut off. Two percent-

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: We're in!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: American Dental Association, a gleaming skyscraper, day. Then the interior is shown, with all the dentists assembled. Dr. Roberts speaks

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Fellow dentists: As you all know, we are still having numerous reports of missing teeth from all over the country. There are also reports of missing tooth fairy money. We believe that there can be only one logical reason for all of this.  A giant half-chicken/half-squirrel that steals either teeth or money from children as they sleep in order to build some kind of giant nest  for its genetically superior and potentially dangerous offspring! We believe also that this creature would have at least a mild understanding of algebra , and that it-

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Uh, excuse me? I think I have a more logical theory.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: ...Yeah. Weh well, by all means, Mr. Foley, enlighten us!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I think what we've got here is some kind of black-market tooth racket. Something where one group is stealing the money and teeth from another group for a profit.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, Mr. Foley, you realize how ridiculous that sounds.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: It's not ridiculous. It's very possible. I've seen it happen before.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Where?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: In Montreal.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: And where, pray, is this "Montreal"?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Look, I know how to handle this. All we have to do is bring down the kingpin and the rest will fall. You'll see! I'll have it taken care of in a matter of weeks!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Uhyub-dub very well, Mr. Foley, you go on your wild goosechase and meanwhile, we'll deal with the real problems at hand.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, I will!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Anyway, the half-chicken/half-squirrel would most likely be about three to four-and-a-half feet tall. His large beak is probably detachable, and works as a flotation device.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: South Park Elementary, day. Lunchtime in the cafeteria

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Here! Here, over here, look! Look what I got- I got from the chef!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hello there, children.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hey, Chef.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: We all want double-desserts today!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh. Well, uh, I'm afraid that the school charges extra for that.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah? Well, that ain't nothin' but a thang.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh my God! There has got to be at least fifteen dollars here!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: That's right. Keep the change, my man.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well! Look at you cute little crackers! With your money and your fancy clothes and your cell phones, it's almost like you were-  Oh my God, children! What have I told you about drugs?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: That there's a time and a place for everything, and it's called "college."

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: That's right. And the only thing worse than doin' drugs is dealin' drugs! I'm gonna tell you about when I was your age and got offered drugs.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Ooo, come on, now.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hey, kid. You wanna try some dope?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Come on, kid. Don't you wanna get high?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hey, man, I don't need dope. Let me sing you a little song:

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
role: I can't wait until I grow up

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
role: and my weenie get and strong

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
role: 'Cause when it does I'm gonna bust

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
role: And make love to Amanda all night long

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
role: I'm gonna make love to Amanda in about ten years!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What the hell is he talking about?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: And that toothpick is gonna turn into an oak tree,...

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: U-uh, Chef.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I'ma knock you down, knock you up,...

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Chef!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: ...knock you over, and knock you all around.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: CHEF!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Uh?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: We're not dealing drugs!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: You're not?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, uh weh-ell, children, whatever you're doin', just remember this: havin' money may seem fun, but...  Ooh, uh-oh, never mind.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Thanks, Chef.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: See ya.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Damn, that little Amanda was fine! I'm gonna look her up.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The boys return to the cafeteria with their food

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude, having this much money is great! Working for Loogie rules!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah, but you know, why do we need Loogie? We know how the trade works: why don't we do it ourselves and keep all the profit?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: We can't do that, dude. Loogie will kick our asses.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, what the hell is that little Pollack gonna do, huh? Come on, you guys. I say we create our own mob crime family!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude, this book says there could be infinite alternate realities to every reality.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Sure, Kyle.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Loogie's restaurant, night. Loogie's talking to someone on his cell phone at table

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: They're what?! They're not gonna pay me? Who the hell do they think they are? I want those South Park kids dead! I want their families dead! I want their houses burned to the ground!  Oh, hi there, Mister. My mommy and daddy are out front, if you need 'em.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Let's cut the crap, kid. My name is Tom Foley. I'm with the American Dental Association.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Sit down, Mr. Foley. Do you want some spaghetti?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: No thanks, I just brushed. I just wanted to let you know that I'm onto you.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I told the ADA a thousand times: I know nothing about teeth. I'm just an 8-year-old boy who likes climbing trees and playing in puddles.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I am going to find out who the boss is! And when I do I'm gonna bust his ass and everyone's ass who helped hide his ass!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Cartman's house, day, living room. He is seated behind a desk talking to a boy

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: So, you've brought me 400 lbs. of teeth from China.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: That's right, yeah  . It's all top-grade stuff, too.These Chinese kids are selling their teeth for peanuts, see?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: How much?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, huh, Tang Li wants 30, but, but I can cut you a deal for 28, yeh ha, buh. Heh, ha-buh, what do you say, huh?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Can I ask you a question, Weasel?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Awuh, hawuh, why, sure, sure.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Do you think I'm an idiot?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Huh?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: These are cat teeth, you sonofabitch! You trying to sell me 400 lbs. of cat teeth?!  Get out of my sight!  Lousy little scum!  What?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: This is your last chance, kid! Either you give the boss his cut, or else we're gonna throw your pal into the river wearing concrete galoshes!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I ain't giving you crap! Kenny's not afraid of you!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh my God, this book says that negative and positive are the same thing; that real and not real are one.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The river. Boy 2 hangs up

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: He's not gonna do it?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (He's not gonna do it?!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: He's not gonna do it, boss!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well then, throw him in.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Alright, kid. Time to die.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (No! Nono! No! Don't do this! Nononooo!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh, man, how deep is the Platte River?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: News report, night

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: ...to which Ms. Clinton replied, "I don't even like Vagina." Finally tonight, a human-interest story. Dan Akawa is live.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Thanks, Tom. I'm here at the house of little Billy Circlovich, um. Billy is in desperate need of a bone-marrow transplant  or he will most certainly die.  Billy, how much more money do you need for the transplant?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Sih, six hundred dollar-.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Louder, Billy, we can't hear ya!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Duh six hundred dohollars.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, that's a lot of money.How the hell are you gonna get all that in the short amount of time you have left?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, I a-I don't know.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, Billy, I also understand that you lost a tooth today.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yehahah.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Billy, we want you to put that tooth under your pillow tonight, because we have a feeling that the tooth fairy is going to leave you six hundred dollars for it!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Really?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Really?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yes, really.  Six hundred dollars. I might also mention that Billy lives in Crestview Apartments, just off Arapaho Road on Emporia Street. Back to you, Tom.  How was that?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Perfect. The trap is set.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Naw, come on. D'ya really think anyone will fall for somethin' that stupid?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The Cartman house. Cartman is in a hot tub, Stan and Kyle sit nearby

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Six hundred dollars, you guys! Come on, get your stuff together!  This is gonna be tits!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude, this book says I don't exist unless I think I do. But what if I don't?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Will somebody take those books away from him?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The Circlovich house, night. A Rotary Phone Service van sits out front. Switch to Billy's room. Dad hides the $600 behind his back while Mom talks to Billy

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Be sure to put your loose tooth under your pillow, Billy.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Okay-y, Mom.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Thank you for helping out, gentlemen. If this sting operation works, some bogus tooth fairies should be showing up to take the sick kid's money. When they touch the kid's pillow, an alarm will sound, and that's when you hit the button, Murphy, and activate the lights. Everybody got it?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Got it.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Duuuh, which button do I hit again, boss?  Just kidding. You know how there's always the dumb guy in sting operations in the movies? I was, you know I was actin', I was actin' like him, eheh, oh.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The highway, night. Cartman, Stan, and Kyle walk along a path paralleling the highway. Cartman is dressed as the tooth fairy.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hurry up, you guys. We've gotta get that sick kid's tooth fairy money before Loogie does.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I can't deal with it, Stan. I mean, all the stuff I've been reading; I really don't think I exist!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Dude, just stop thinking about it.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: But I can't, because, what if thinking about it is the only thing keeping my space-time together?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: (You guys! You guys, over here! ...Hey!)

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Sometimes I think I can see time slowing down,  and my own existence fading.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The Circlovich house, the van.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: G'night, Mom. G'night, Dad.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Alright. Everyone, keep your eyes peeled.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I'm going to bed now, Mommy. I put my tooth under the pillow. Do you really think the tooth fairy will give me money for the transplant?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I think so, Billy. I think so.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, I can't wait to feel healthy and strong again.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah, well, you're gonna have to wait a little bit longer, Billy, 'cause that 600 bucks is mine!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Light is a wave unless it's observed? That means all matter is just a wave. Nothing's real! Reality in a nuh- Oh God, it's happening!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Kyle?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Eh something strange is happening with the computers.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, well, well. What do we have here?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Aw, shit.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Did you bastards really think you could hide from me forever? Kolovski , put this buttwipe out of his misery.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I got it!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The tooth fairy!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Let's move out!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Aw, drat!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Give it up, kids. You're surrounded by dentists.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: It was a trap!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: That's right. And now it's all exposed! You're through! The only thing left to do is to haul all you kids down to prison!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: This is reality! I am everywhere , and nowhere.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What the hell?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Kyle?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I am nothing, and everything.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Well, I told you!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Let's get outta here!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Hunh. That was pretty weird.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Jesus! The little sick kid was a setup all along!  How could I be so stupid?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: What?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: I can't believe I fell for such an obvious trap! What the hell is wrong with me?!

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Weh-well, uh, du-don't take it too hard, dude, uh. That's what grown-ups do.They lie. Lie right to your face.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Oh well. Maybe it's good my empire has fallen.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Really?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah. I kinda wanted to play in the flag football team this year anyways.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: So you're not gonna hurt us or nothin'?

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Naah. In a way, I'm just glad the whole thing's over with.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Yeah. But you know, I've learned something today. You see, the basis of all reasoning is the mind's awareness of itself. What we think, the external objects we perceive, are all like actors that come on and off stage. But our conscioousness, the stage itself, is always present to us.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: ...Tits.

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: The Platte River, day. Kenny has turned to his left. As the end credits roll, Kenny tries with great effort to make his way to a bank. He hops a few times and lands in a hidden gully in which he promptly drowns. A motorized chair is soon heard

title: THE TOOTH FAIRY S TATS
text: Timmy!
